description: The armchair is a common furniture item upholstered with polyester (PET) fabric over polyester (PET) batting and flexible polyurethane foam. The frame of the chair was composed of wood.
short desc: The armchair is a common furniture item upholstered with polyester (PET) fabric over polyester (PET) batting and flexible polyurethane foam. The frame of the chair was composed of wood.
source: Chairs were purchased from a national furniture manufacturer and distributor.
